import React from 'react' // Import icons. import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPause, faShuffle, faForwardStep, faBackwardStep, faRepeat } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' // Import photos. import AlbumCover from "../../Photos/Eminem_album_cover.jpg" // Import custom style for the bar handle. import '../../styles/showHandle.css' function ShowSlider () { const sliderStyle = { background: `linear-gradient(to right, #9818d6 ${64}%, #393e46 ${64}%)`, appearance: 'none', width: '100%', height: '6px', borderRadius: '9999px', } return (
{/* / Make space between two icons. */}
) } export default ShowSlider
